channel.title: CTO, Data Science, DevOps, Product Development
channel.description: Recent content on CTO, Data Science, DevOps, Product Development

item.title: Des Holmes
item.description: Technical Leadership & Product Development Over the last 20 years I’ve been providing technical leadership and developing products for a wide range of clients; from startups to global blue chip. I’m currently working at Hentsū, using Agile methodologies, Open Source and public cloud to develop SaaS, DevOps and Data Science products for Hedge Funds and Asset Managers. Recent Technologies: Docker, React, Python, Terraform, Azure, Databricks. During my career I’ve had the pleasure of working with the following brands: Goldman Sachs, Commerzbank, KPMG, BBC, HSBC, JP Morgan, Deutsche Bank, Ernst & Young, Akzonobel, Sainsbury’s, Reckitt Benckiser, Heineken, Pernod Ricard, Diageo, Adidas, Nike, VWG.
